mapper.insert: insert into aca_ma_cla_info (id, grade, academyname, academycode, department, updatetime, isdelete) values (#{id}, #{grade}, #{academyName}, #{academyCode}, #{department}, NOW(), #{isdelete})
mapper.update: update aca_ma_cla_info set id=#{newid}, grade=#{grade}, academyname=#{academyName}, academycode=#{academyCode}, isdelete=#{isdelete}, updatetime=NOW() where id = #{id}
